articles.title: FAA Establishes Restrictions On Drone Operations Over DOJ And USCG Facilities
articles.description: Changes Become Effective June 20th At the request of federal security partners, the FAA has been using its existing authority under Title 14 of the Code of Federal Regulations (14 CFR)§ 99.7 – “Special Security Instructions” – to address concerns about drone …
